data.actual_result: Both actions are done at the same time, causing your client to bug out and show a black screen for a second
data.expected_result: Whatever button you pressed second should overpower the button you pressed first
data.short_description: Pressing the share button in the debug menu and your phone's native "back" button at the same time causes your screen to flash black for a second
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the debug menu - Press the share button and your phone's native "back" button - Observe
